altTitles.zh-ro: Shi Yi Chang An: Ming Yue Ji Shi You

description.en:
In order to fulfil her mission of bringing peace to her homeland, the Uyghur Princess Amelia travels to Chang'an and marries Emperor Dezong of Tang's ninth prince, Li Qian. While she had been considered very capable in her homeland, the complex and foreign customs of the Tang court are something else entirely; and although she had not expected love in a political marriage, the sheer disinterest and arrogance of her husband is very hard to handle, no matter how capable and handsome he may be. Securing peace between the Uyghur Khaganate and the Tang Empire is not going to be easy, especially with the rebellion taking place in Tang.  

 ---

[Official English Subtitled Donghua](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBakWosU0sfhqdN5TFbbITb7Bm93T3-PW)
description.pt-br: Na esperança de unir Uighur e Tang, a Princesa Amelia deve se casar com o 9º príncipe de Tang. No entanto, Amelia está longe de ser uma princesa comum: antes de conhecer o Imperador, ela troca de lugar com sua pobre empregada para ter mais liberdade! Mas parece que o futuro marido dela não é muito tipico: ao chegar ao palácio, ele não aparece para conhecê-la! Que futuro espera esse casal que nada pensa sobre o casamento e qual será o destino de seus países trancados na guerra?!

altTitles.ja: 好きだ！！岡くん！！

description.vi: Bạn cùng lớp của Satsuki Oka, Hajime Tsunefusa, hẹn cậu trên sân thượng và tỏ tình với cậu. Mặc dù không kì thị đồng tính nhưng trước giờ cậu chưa từng hẹn hò với con trai. Cậu lập tức từ chối Hajime nhưng sau đó Hajime lại bắt đầu lẽo đẽo theo cậu… Đừng bỏ lỡ câu chuyện này của tác giả Sawaco, tác phẩm đầu tay đã bán hết sạch tại hội chợ truyện tranh dành cho người hâm mộ!!!!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Ken to Tiara to High Heels

altTitles.en: Sword, Tiara and High Heels: The Duke's Daughter Has the Soul of a Hero

altTitles.ja: 剣とティアラとハイヒール〜公爵令嬢には英雄の魂が宿

description.en:
The kingdom's hero, Ortus (♂), dies in battle after failing to fulfil a promise he made to protect the kingdom for the rest of his life. When he wakes up, he finds that he has been reincarnated as Seretina, the duke's daughter!  
  
Even though she's a lovely, beautiful girl, she's still the same and determined to become a knight to protect her country in this life. However, besides being sickly and fragile, she is also faced with the harsh fate of a lady. She has to learn manners from her horrible mother, marry a man she doesn't want to marry, and many other challenges that will keep her from becoming a knight.  
  
Then, on the way to the royal castle, a demon attack reveals her true power that no one knows about! A new heroine is born, with the strength to slay demons with a single blow, and the peerless beauty to captivate even people in high society!  
She’s pretty on the outside, but fearless on the inside!   
The chivalric, heroic fantasy of a feeble young woman begins!

altTitles.ja-ro: Tome wa Hane! Suzusato Koukou Shodoubu

altTitles.ja: とめはねっ!
とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部
とめはねっ！−鈴里高校書道部−

description.en:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

After saving a small village from troublesome bandits, three young adventurers decide to partake in the notorious Walesena Military Trials, a decision that sparked a journey none of the three could ever dream of.

Join them on the epic tale through the vast and fantastical world called Walesena.

description.fr: Après la chute de la troisième lune au centre de la ville, des personnes dotées de superpouvoirs sont apparues, que l'on a commencé à appeler des "phénomènes". C'est l'histoire d'une armée de résistance qui vit sur la lune et utilise ouvertement ses capacités, et des phénomènes du gouvernement qui protègent le bien des habitants de la ville en empêchant les attaques depuis la lune.

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

description.en: A complicated web of relationships between two sets of childhood friends. How can all of them reach their happily ever after?

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

title.en: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke

altTitles.en: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt

description.en:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

title.en: Only I Know the World Is Ending And Getting Killed by Rampaging Beasts Only Makes Me Stronger

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Sekai ga Izure Horobu Koto wo, Ore dake ga Shitte Iru

altTitles.ja: この世界がいずれ滅ぶことを、俺だけが知っている　～モンスターが現れた世界で、死に戻りレベルアップ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Sekai ga Izure Horobu Koto o, Ore dake ga Shitteiru: Monster ga Arawareta Sekai de, Shi ni Modori Level Up

altTitles.en: Only I Know That the World Will End ~ In a World Where Monsters Appear, I Level Up by Returning From Death

altTitles.ja: この世界がいずれ滅ぶことを、俺だけが知っている

description.en:
Akira Ichijo is your average, run-of-the-mill businessman.

One day, on his way home from work, he is suddenly attacked by a Minotaur and killed on the spot. But in the blink of an eye... he wakes up back at the office!

When monsters invade into the real world, a cruel reality sets in as the world as we know it plummets into destruction and death. But with the unique skill [Resurrection], Akira can come back to life every time he dies, all the while inheriting the same levels and skills from his last run at life!

With unlimited chances to correct his past mistakes, it's up to Akira to utilize the skill he's given and survive this terrifying world with his childhood friend, Nao Nanase.

altTitles.ja: なおざりダンジョン
薔薇色ノ約束

description.en:
Iroha, the daughter of a good family, has just lost her father and was grieving in her garden when an arrogant but handsome man dressed in a military uniform trespasses and changes her life forever…  
  
The latest manga from Kaho Miyasaka set in a Taisho era-esque world.

altTitles.en: Master Unexpectedly Wants to Kill Me

description.en:
Super luck newbie disciple X Sly superb doormat master.
Watch to see how the scheming flower "Sasa is quite lucky" game on in the world of 《Fate》! - Sasa: "Master~ Let's go to the next instance dungeon to get some new items! - One Fold: "Dammit, when will I be able to get rid of this idiotic disciple?!"

altTitles.ja: ぜんぶきみの性

description.en:
A romantic comedy of uncertain characters. Sagimiya Ryou, the main character, woke up as a girl one day because of the effects of an unknown sex change syndrome. Ryou, now living with this rare syndrome, meets Mizukami Nagisa on a tour of Tensei Gakuen high school. As the two find each other in a cosplay cafe, Ryou discovers Nagisa's secret.

A (physical) mixed romantic comedy!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01201412010000_68), [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/45760)
description.ja: ある日突然、性転換症候群の影響で女の子になってしまった主人公・鷺宮了を中心とした、男女あやふやなキャラクターたちが織り成すクロッシングラブコメディ。“性転換症候群”という稀な体質の鷺宮了は、高校の学校見学で出会った水上凪沙に憧れを抱き、凪沙のいる天清学園へ入学することになった。２人が再会を果たしたのは凪沙が働くコスプレ喫茶で、さらに凪沙にはヒミツが――？

altTitles.ja: 2ndバージンのじょうずな捨て方

altTitles.en: How To Skillfully Lose Your 2nd Viriginity

altTitles.vi: Cách Vứt Bỏ Trinh Tiết Lần Hai

description.en:
Chiaki ended up being called a dead fish after his first time having sex with his boyfriend didn't go so well. Afterward, he ended up drunkenly calling a gay AV company to apply as a gay actor, and the perfect guy he meets there is...?! 

Drawn by Zunda Mochiko-sensei, an exceptionally thorough private lesson!
description.vi: Kei yêu thầm Chiaki từ thời còn đi học, anh quyết định tỏ tình ngày Chiaki sắp tốt nghiệp nhưng vì Chiaki hoang mang (do lần đầu được con trai tỏ tình) thì Kei (chưa kịp nghe câu trả lời) đã bỏ chạy mất dép vì nghĩ anh ghê tởm mình, sau này cũng vì quá buồn do thất tình nên Kei mới sống buông thả mình ( thậm chí làm diễn viên đóng phim) gần mấy năm trời nhưng Kei cũng chỉ chung thủy yêu mình Chiaki, đến lúc khi cả 2 người đã thành người yêu mỗi sáng Kei vẫn cứ hỏi đi hỏi lại Chiaki “Liệu em có đang nằm mơ không anh” vì nghĩ mình và Chiaki sẽ không bao giờ thành đôi được.

altTitles.ja: デッドロック

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

altTitles.ja: 男友達と女友達

title.en: Genkai OL to Joshi Daisei ga 〇〇 Suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 限界OLと女子大生が〇〇する話

altTitles.en: An OL at Her Limit and a College Girl

description.en: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin, and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter, the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!
description.ja: 仕事ができて皆から頼られる完璧OL 瀬川さん。しかし家では、汚部屋で毎日コンビニ飯を食べる限界生活を送っていた。ある日、お隣に住む片付け上手でしっかり者の女子大生 安藤さんに部屋の片付けを手伝ってもらうことになり…？

altTitles.ja: バウンサー

description.en: The manga centers on Jouichirou Shishido, a 19-year-old man whose frank honesty has cost him 26 part time jobs. One night, he runs into a group of muscular bodyguards who protect the streets at night, members of a private security firm known as "Tokyo Fist," which ends up changing his life.

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

altTitles.en: Qi Resurgence: Rising Of The Strongest Hero

description.en: Lü Bu, who was reincarnated into the era of spiritual energy recovery, became the hero of this world. After awakening the strongest Flying General System, he set his heart on becoming the strongest in the world and protecting his family.
description.fr: Lu Bu est réincarné dans l'ère de "Qi Resurgence" et vise à devenir le héros le plus fort du monde tout en protégeant sa famille avec un système de triche vraiment cheaté.
description.zh: 转生进入灵气复苏时代的吕布，成为这个世界的勇者。觉醒了最强飞将系统的他，一心想要成为世界最强者，保护自己的家人

altTitles.zh-ro: Tā De Shān, Tā De Hǎi

description.en: (Gentle, tenacious honor student and the cold domineering girl) Chi Tang and Youyu are both weirdos in Year 1 Class 2 of high school. They become desk mates, roommates, each other's salvation, protecting the other's warmth. The relationship between the two went from ignorance to understanding. A poem of youth composed.
description.zh: （温柔坚韧学霸&骄横高冷少女）池唐和游余都是高一二班被敬而远之的异类，她们成为同桌和室友，也成为救赎、保护彼此的温暖。两人的感情从懵懂到刻骨，谱写一首青春的诗歌。

description.en:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

altTitles.ja: シトラスプラス

description.en: High schoolers (and stepsisters) Yuzu and Mei have gone public with their relationship! The two are happy to be dating out in the open, but friends and family keep trying to butt in with advice. Can Yuzu and Mei figure things out on their own?
description.it: Seguito di Citrus ambientato dopo la fine del manga! Yuzu è riuscita a convincere Mei a tornare da lei e le ha chiesto di sposarla! In Citrus+ seguiremo le vicende delle due ragazze una volta riunite e delle loro amiche che non le lasciano mai sole.
description.pt-br: As estudantes do ensino médio (e meias-irmãs) Yuzu e Mei foram a público com seu relacionamento! As duas estão felizes em namorar ao ar livre, mas amigos e familiares continuam tentando se aproximar com conselhos. Yuzu e Mei podem resolver as coisas sozinhas?

altTitles.ja: 宵々モノローグ

description.en: An out-of-season movie club / new member, Shion is a first-year student who want to fall in love.  He declares that he has joined the movie club to make a boyfriend, and even after his retirement he collides with former deputy director Inaba Rei.  However, after that, he suddenly decided to go out with him !?  He was nervous about the development that was different from the "dating" he was thinking ...?

title.en: If You're Gonna Dress Up, Do It Like This

altTitles.ja: Do it this way if you wear the clothes.

altTitles.vi: Đã ăn diện thì phải ăn diện sao cho đúng.

altTitles.ja-ro: Fuku wo Kiru nara Konna Fuu ni

altTitles.ja: 服を着るならこんなふうに

description.en: Yuusuke, an average office worker meets with his friend at a reunion, only to find out that the fashion world has left him behind. Now, with the help of his sister Tamaki, Yuusuke must take his step into the world of trends and charisma.
description.pt-br: Yuusuke, um trabalhador de escritório comum encontra-se com seu amigo em uma reunião, apenas para descobrir que o mundo da moda o deixou para trás. Agora, com a ajuda de sua irmã Tamaki, Yuusuke deve entrar no mundo das tendências e do carisma

altTitles.ja: 鎧塚さんをバブらせたい

description.en: Kurumi is a shy and easily embarrassed high school girl with a strong imagination. Her girlfriend is a cool, iron-faced office worker, Ms. Yoroizuka, who doesn't show much emotion. In order to get the older woman to indulge in her, Kurumi tries all sorts of things to spoil Ms. Yoroizuka, but...?

altTitles.ja: モデルちゃんと地味マネさん

description.en: A cool model and a manager’s romantic comedy begins!

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.ja-ro: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.en: The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 飛野さんのバカ

description.en: Class president and overall good girl Koguma is concerned that her classmate Hino often skips classes by spending her time behind one of the school buildings. Koguma feels it's her duty to guide Hino down a better path, even if it means going along with Hino's unusual requests.
description.pt-br: A presidente da classe e boa garota em geral, Koguma, está preocupada com sua colega de classe, Hino, que muitas vezes mata aula, passando o tempo atrás de um dos prédios da escola. Koguma sente que é seu dever guiar Hino por um caminho melhor, mesmo que isso signifique concordar com os pedidos incomuns de Hino.

altTitles.ja: アップルパルフェ おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
The relationship between "girls" and "women".
A completely new yuri anthology of "onee-and-loli" stories, all by different authors.

Cover: Kawaku

**Chapters**:
1. **Mashiro-chan's future lover** (Mashiro-chan no Mirai no Koibito, ましろちゃんの未来の恋人) by Itou Hachi
2. **Midnight funeral Where I can't let it be found** (Zettai ni Bare te wa Ikenai Soushiki 24-ji, 絶対にバレてはいけない葬式２４時) by Canno
3. **Scent and reflection** (Kaori to Kaze, 香りと影) by Terayama Den
4. **The Place Where We Belong** (Futari no Ibasho, ふたりの居場所) by Hazuki
5. **My Little Sister's Loved One** (Imouto-chan no Daisuki na Mono, 妹ちゃんの大好きなもの) by Izumi Kirifu
6. **Koma-chan and Sensei's Time** (Koma-chan to Sensei no Jikan, こまちゃんとせんせいのじかん) by kurimo.
7. **Failure** (Dame na Hito, だめなひと) by Masanaga
8. **A Dream of Spring on a Tatami Mat** (Ichi-jou Shunmu, 一畳春夢) by Sakasana

altTitles.ja: 鬱ごはん

title.en: Makita-kun no Koiji wo Jama Suru to Shinu

altTitles.es: Si interfieres en el camino del amor de Makita-Kun, Morirás.

altTitles.ja: 牧田くんの恋路をジャマすると死ぬ

altTitles.en: Don't Get in the Way of Shun's Romance

altTitles.vi: Nếu cản đường tình yêu của Makita, bạn sẽ chết

description.en: Kaoru, a high school student infamously known as a fighting-fanatic, gains a sudden fascination with a new transfer student who is rumored to be incredibly dangerous. One day, he witnesses this mysterious underclassman, Shun, in a blood-boiling fight and ends up falling head-over-heels in love... But, when he goes to confess, he's mistaken as another attacker and must defend himself against the younger boy's lethal strikes! While the fight leaves Kaoru beaten and bruised, he suddenly finds himself being kissed...!? As if that wasn't confusing enough, Shun seems endeared by Kaoru's inexperience with love and agrees to date him, kicking off the start of a terrifying romance!
description.es:
Tokiwa, un estudiante de secundaria famoso por ser fanático de las peleas, obtiene una fascinación repentina por el nuevo estudiante transferido, que se rumorea que es increíblemente peligroso. 
Un día, ve a este misterioso estudiante de primer año, Makita-kun, en una pelea sangrienta y termina enamorándose perdidamente... pero, cuando va a confesarse, lo confunden con otro atacante y debe defenderse de los golpes letales de Makita-kun! Mientras que la pelea deja a Tokiwa golpeado y magullado, ¿¡De repente se encuentra siendo besado...!?. Makita-kun parece enamorarse de la inexperiencia amorosa de Kaoru y acepta salir con él.  
¡Lo que da inicio a un romance aterrador!
description.vi: Tokiwa, nổi tiếng với sự điên loạn, thích đánh đấm đột nhiên hứng thú với Makita- một học sinh lớp dưới mới chuyển vào. Một ngày nọ, khi tình cờ bắt gặp cảnh đánh nhau của Makita, Tokiwa đã rơi vào lưới tình. Cậu bị Makita phát hiện đang nhìn trộm, trong lúc đang cố gắng giải thích hiểu lầm thì Makita tấn công cậu bằng 1 nụ hôn thô bạo!?

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: She is the neighbor Angel, I am spoilt by her.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.vi: Kết Thúc Mối Quan Hệ Bạn Tình Này Thôi

altTitles.ja: セフレ、やっぱなしで

description.en: "Would you like to have sex with me once?" Tsukioka's love life doesn't go well because his private parts are XL size.One day, his classmate Tokieda sees his private parts and proposes sex.Tsukioka, who worries about being too big, and Tokieda, who is loyal and greedy for what feels good, are a perfect fit in terms of compatibility and size!A limited-time sex friend relationship begins, “until the two find a girlfriend”, but they gradually begin to be attracted to each other's true faces...?A youthful tale of unrequited love between young people!

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: A Single Aristocrat Enjoys a Different World: The Graceful Life of a Man Who Never Gets Married

altTitles.ja-ro: Dokushin Kizoku wa Isekai wo Ouka Suru ~Kekkon Shinai Otoko no Yuuga na Ohitori-sama Life~

altTitles.ja: 独身貴族は異世界を謳歌する ～結婚しない男の優雅なおひとりさまライフ～

altTitles.id: Bangsawan Lajang Yang Menikmati Hidup di Dunia Lain

description.en:
Toshinori Dokuraba, 35 years old. A so-called single aristocrat in Japan who enjoyed a single life without wife and children, even though he was tall, handsome, highly educated and had a high income. One day, he died alone at home.

However, he was liked by Hitorigami, the God of another world, and was able to reincarnate in that world. Reborn as Zirc Louren with skills and blessings from the God, he lived a new rosy life in a different world - then he turned 28 years old and enjoyed the single life again...

This is a story about the life of a single aristocrat who never gets married even if he reincarnates in another world.

altTitles.ja: 虹は夜光に煌めく

altTitles.en: The rainbow will sparkles at night

altTitles.vi: Cầu Vồng Lấp Lánh Ánh Đèn Đêm

description.en: Nakajima, who enjoys traveling alone got lost wandering on a legendary mountain of many rumors. He was helped by Kanzawa, who lives alone nearby. In the midst of his purposeless journey, Nakajima is fascinated by Kanzawa, who lives like a recluse. This is the story of Kanzawa who lives quietly on a secluded mountain and Nakajima who comes from a crowded city.
description.vi: Nakajima, người thích đi du lịch một mình, đã lạc đường khi đang lang thang trên ngọn núi huyền thoại với nhiều tin đồn bí ẩn. Anh được Kanzawa, người sống một mình gần đó giúp đỡ. Giữa cuộc hành trình không mục đích của mình, Nakajima bị mê hoặc bởi Kanzawa- người sống ẩn dật. Đây là câu chuyện tình về một Kanzawa sống lặng lẽ trên ngọn núi hẻo lánh và một Nakajima đến từ nơi thành phố đông đúc.

altTitles.ja: 新人の子が凄かった

title.en: The Return of Elena the Knight

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại của Nữ Hiệp Sĩ

description.en:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
description.id: Elena, yang menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai seorang ksatria wanita berdarah dingin untuk membalaskan dendam keluarganya, akhirnya mati tanpa menuntut balas. Ketika dia membuka matanya, dia menemukan bahwa dia kembali ke masa lalu. Pada siang hari dia menjadi seorang wanita bangsawan, dan pada malam hari dia membawa pedang untuk mengubah sejarah dan mencegah kehancuran keluarganya. "Saya ingin menikahi Anda, Yang Mulia," katanya kepada putra mahkota. Dia akan melakukan ini untuk menyelamatkan keluarganya.

altTitles.ja: アサシン＆シンデレラ

description.en: Neneko is spying on a rival organization's assassin, but her true identity is revealed, and the condition for her safety is "marriage"!? The world's sweetest and most dangerous «Contract Marriage» begins!!

title.en: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế bệ hạ là nữ lang

altTitles.my: ဘုရင်ကြီးကမိန်းကလေးမှန်းမသိခဲ့ဘူး

altTitles.vi: Không Ngờ Bệ Hạ Là Nữ

description.en:
The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important, and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.

Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?

A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!
description.zh: 新帝祁念登基多年，却终日以“国事要紧，朕沉迷工作”，拒绝了朝臣们的选妃请求。但“皇帝不行”的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不胜其烦，终是松口。玉玎珰出身名门，却生了个榆木脑袋，众人纷纷道：“玉家小姐是拿脑子换的脸”却不想，一朝入选，她竟成了国母。玉玎珰表面：啊？什么？是我吗？内心却汹涌澎湃。只因玉玎珰从小便立誓，一！定！要！成！为！祁！念！的！女！人！迷妹追星成功，在皇宫里上演了一系列“她逃她追，她插翅难飞”的啼笑皆非的欢喜故事却不想，这高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女儿身？！
description.zh-hk: 新帝祁念登基多年，卻終日以“國事要緊，朕沉迷工作”，拒絕了朝臣們的選妃請求。 但「皇帝不行」的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不勝其煩，終是鬆口。 玉玎璫出身名門，卻生了個榆木腦袋，眾人紛紛道：「玉家小姐是拿腦子換的臉」卻不想，一朝入選，她竟成了國母。 玉玎璫表面：啊？ 什麼？ 是我嗎？ 內心卻洶湧澎湃。 只因玉玎璫從小便立誓，一！ 定！ 要！ 成！ 為！ 祁！ 念！ 的！ 女！ 人！ 迷妹追星成功，在皇宮裡上演了一系列「她逃她追，她插翅難飛」的啼笑皆非的歡喜故事卻不想，這高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女兒身？ ！

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

title.en: Nagaku mo Mijikaki Koi no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 長くも短き恋の話

altTitles.en: A Long Yet Short Love Story

description.en:
Kippei and Ibuki are childhood friends and neighbors who seem to be polar opposites. 
As the seasons change, will their attitude towards each other do too...?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_005483_S?episodeType=comics), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/10293)

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun - I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site" -

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」
